Hi!
I'm Candice.

I am a web developer from Laurel, Maryland (located halfway between Baltimore, Maryland and Washington, D.C.). I love coding responsive, accessible, cross-browser code for Drupal and other content management systems.

I believe that utilizing component-based designs and creating style guides are critical to project success. If you want to read more about my thoughts on these topics visit my blog posts on the subject matter.

I've been having a long-term love affair with QA for a while now and checklists are kind of my jam. I believe that anything is possible with enough research and that accessible websites lead to better web experiences for everybody. One of the things that I love about web development is that it provides an endless opportunity to dig into new technologies (CSS Grids! Flexbox!) because technology is constantly evolving and I love learning new things.

Sounds like we might get along? Contact me!
